meta.name: No Pending Count
meta.tagline: Removes the ping count of incoming friend requests, message requests, and nitro offers.
meta.description: Removes the badge count indicators for incoming friend requests, message requests, and Nitro offers. Each can be toggled individually in settings. Ported from [Vencord noPendingCount made by amia](https://github.com/Vendicated/Vencord/tree/main/src/plugins/noPendingCount).
